page.title: 04Fishacre Farm
page.content: We went to Fishacre Farm and there were three dogs there. Then we saw the farmer. First of all we looked around and saw that the farmer had about six tractors and accessories. He has 120 South Devon cows for breeding. The farmer grows a very special crop, wheat for thatching. He has thirty acres of it and gets about 25-30 tons from it. About 4% of wheat straw sales are local. He also grows all the food for his animals by himself. He is a mixed farmer. He does make a good living and he likes his job. He said he wouldn't do it if he didn't like it. He uses manure but no pesticides. He uses seaweed and not fertiliser. He uses very old style machinery for cutting the thatching wheat and threshing it, but he uses modern machinery for everything else.
